Just thought i'de mention, and someone else mantioned it a little while ago in an earlier message. When trying to rn the game for the first time My Firewall (that also acts in a way similar to spy doctor acts) keeps telling me that 'sins of a solar empire' exe is trying to record key strokes. I've looked into this quite considerably and no one anywhere has mentioned the legit game does this. Also the actual key 'logger' is coming from the 'cracked' exe, not any part of the original game directory.

Why a crack for the game would need to record keystrokes is beyond me. Apart from the obvious possability that it is actually a keylogger that is recording the keystrokes of everyone thats installed this game for various dubious reasons. i have been playing this for a day or so, but due to this i am more than likely going to completely remove this installation from my computer and do a deep clean of the computer to make sure nothing fuckery has been left behind.

Dodgy install. There is undeniably a keylogger that is proven to actively attempt to record keystrokes in the crack to this game which has absolutely no reason to be there. Let me re-iterate. this is NOT a false possitive. The keylogger has been flagged as 'actively' attempting to record key strokes.

Do yourself a favour and find a different version to torrent.
